content.text: Hands are scored based on the cards in them. The better cards included in a hand, the higher the score.
Click or drag cards from the bottom of the screen to the highlighted tiles on the game board to make 5 card hands.
Hands are made by placing 5 cards horizontally or vertically in a line. Cards already on the board count too.
Fill all orders to complete a puzzle. Click the “?” button next to an order for help.
Special cards do not behave like normal cards, they have unique actions when played in a hand that can help you complete orders.

content.name: JOKER
content.description: When a Joker is placed on the board, it becomes any card of your choice. There are two Jokers in a standard deck.

content.name: WILDCARD
content.description: When scoring a hand, Wildcards are always treated as the card that will create the highest scoring hand.

content.text: Boosters can be used before starting a puzzle to gain an advantage that lasts for the entire puzzle.

content.name: Loosen Your Belt
content.description: You can draw one extra card from your deck at a time. Giving you more options to play.

content.name: Deuces Wild
content.description: All twos in your deck turn into Wildcards when they are drawn.

content.text: Powerups can be used before playing a hand to help complete objectives.

content.name: Cooking The Books
content.description: Select any card you have and increase or decrease its value by 1. This can allow you to make specific hands when you really need them.

content.name: Extra Servings
content.description: Activate before playing a hand to double the score of that hand. This is a great way to complete score orders quickly.

content.name: Refire
content.description: Burn any number of cards and draw new ones. This allows you to get rid of cards you don't need and get new ones to help you complete orders.

content.name: +7 Cards
content.description: If you run out of cards add 7 more to your deck. This keeps the game going and gives you more options to play.

content.name: +1 Joker
content.description: Immediately add a joker to your cards. This can allow you to make specific hands when you really need them.

content.name: Clean Down
content.description: Remove the last 5 hards played from the board. If the board is full, this will make more space. Don't worry, you keep all your previously scored hands.

content.text: Access the task list via Viola's phone. Use the stars you earn from puzzles to complete tasks.
Unlock new decorations by completing tasks. Some decorations are free, others cost coins.
Tap the Build Mode button to see all the decorations you can swap. Tap on one to see the list of options.
